fields.value: Replication data for: Observation-Driven Mixed-Measurement Dynamic Factor Models with an Application to Credit Risk

authorAffiliation.value: University of Chicago Booth School of Business

publicationCitation.value: Creal, Drew, Schwaab, Bernd, Koopman, Siem Jan, and Lucas, Andre, (2014) "Observation-Driven Mixed-Measurement Dynamic Factor Models with an Application to Credit Risk." Review of Economics and Statistics 96:5, 898-915.

files.description: This is an Ox file that estimates the model for the beta distribution.
files.label: betaModel.ox

dataFile.description: This is an Ox file that estimates the model for the beta distribution.

files.description: The credit ratings data is not publically available. It can be obtained from Moody's Investor Services. This document describes which series we extracted from the Moody's database and how we cleaned the data.
files.label: crealSchwabKoopmanLucas2013_data_READ_ME.pdf

dataFile.description: The credit ratings data is not publically available. It can be obtained from Moody's Investor Services. This document describes which series we extracted from the Moody's database and how we cleaned the data.

files.description: This is a .CSV file that contains the monthly macroeconomic data (9 total series from 1981 to 2010). This is the same data as in the Ox .bn7 data files.
files.label: CSKL_macrosMonthly_data.csv

dataFile.description: This is a .CSV file that contains the monthly macroeconomic data (9 total series from 1981 to 2010). This is the same data as in the Ox .bn7 data files.

files.description: This is the macroeconomic data. It is in an Ox data file.
files.label: CSKL_mMacrosMonthly.bn7

dataFile.description: This is the macroeconomic data. It is in an Ox data file.

files.description: This is the second part of the macroeconomic data. It is an Ox .in7 file. This file as well as the .bn7 file contain the macro data used in the paper.
files.label: CSKL_mMacrosMonthly.in7

dataFile.description: This is the second part of the macroeconomic data. It is an Ox .in7 file. This file as well as the .bn7 file contain the macro data used in the paper.

files.description: This is an Ox .bn7 data file. It contains the dates associated with the monthly macroeconomic data.
files.label: CSKL_vTimeMonthly.bn7

dataFile.description: This is an Ox .bn7 data file. It contains the dates associated with the monthly macroeconomic data.

files.description: This is an Ox .in7  data file. It along with the .bn7 file contains the dates of the monthly macroeconomic data.
files.label: CSKL_vTimeMonthly.in7

dataFile.description: This is an Ox .in7  data file. It along with the .bn7 file contains the dates of the monthly macroeconomic data.

files.description: This is an Ox file that estimates the Gaussian component of the model using the United States macroeconomic data available in this database.
files.label: gaussianModel_macroData.ox

dataFile.description: This is an Ox file that estimates the Gaussian component of the model using the United States macroeconomic data available in this database.

files.description: This is the Ox file that replicates the main results from the paper. The data on credit ratings is not publically available but can be obtained from Moody's Investor Services. The accompanying READ ME file describes how to extract the data from this database and use it with this Ox file.
files.label: mixturePanelModel_but_data_not_public.ox

dataFile.description: This is the Ox file that replicates the main results from the paper. The data on credit ratings is not publically available but can be obtained from Moody's Investor Services. The accompanying READ ME file describes how to extract the data from this database and use it with this Ox file.

files.description: This is an Ox file that estimates the model for the ordered Logit component of the model.
files.label: orderedLogitModel.ox

dataFile.description: This is an Ox file that estimates the model for the ordered Logit component of the model.

files.description: This text file describes the Ox computer programs that replicate the results in the paper.
files.label: READ ME.txt

dataFile.description: This text file describes the Ox computer programs that replicate the results in the paper.
